column3: Something in the air has Ponnixia distressed.

Malevolent sylphs have been working their mischief on the forest's mushrooms, lacing them with a poisonous powder that coaxes them to emit toxic fumes. Wash them with spring water to spare the sylphs of Little Solace from a coughing epidemic.
You have doused the mushrooms, removing their poisonous properties. Inform Ponnixia she may breathe easy again.
Ponnixia takes a deep breath, savoring the clean, crisp forest air. Once again, you have proven yourself a true friend to Little Solace and its inhabitants.
Douse the greater banestools with spring water.
Just when this one thought touched ones couldn't get any nastier! Does friendly one smell something funny in the air?
This one saw touched ones scattering strange powder on stinkshrooms, making nasty stink even stinkier! These ones cannot stop sniffling and sneezing.
Please, friendly one! Wash nasty one's nasty powder off of stinkshrooms, before all of these ones become sickly ones.
Please, friendly one! Wash powder off of stinkshrooms, before all of these ones become sickly ones.
This one's nose has stopped tingling. Friendly one has cleaned stinkshrooms of their stink, yes?
These ones breathe a sigh of relief. Ahhhhhh, does friendly one not too love the sweet smells of the forest?
